means: 击自己的球使其撞打对方的球

sentence.Network_en: You can engage in croquet on the south lawn.
sentence.Network_cn: 你可以参加南边草坪上的槌球游戏。

sentence.Network_en: She cheated herself in a game of croquet she was playing against herself.
sentence.Network_cn: 她跟自己玩槌球的时候欺骗了自己.

sentence.Network_en: An excellent time to try out my new croquet set.
sentence.Network_cn: 嗯,这是个试验我最新想出来的槌球游戏的好机会.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 19th cent.: perhaps a dialect form of French crochet 'hook'

encyclopedia.content: 三维应用开发环境 Croquet 是一个功能强大的开放源码软件开发环境，用于创建和大型分布式部署多用户虚拟三维应用程序和metaverses是（ 1 ）持久性（ 2 ）深入的合作， （ 3 ）相互联系和（ 4 ）互操作。Croquet 的架构支持同步通信，协作，资源共享和计算之间的大量用户在多种平台和多种设备。 单词义音标 英音：[krəu'kei]美音：[kro'ke] 词典解释 名词n. 1. 槌球戏；循环球戏 及物动词vt. 不及物动词vi. 1. 锛堥城蝻級

entry.tran: 槌球游戏(在草地上进行，以木槌击球使之穿过金属圈)
entry.def: Croquet is a game played on grass in which the players use long wooden sticks called mallets to hit balls through metal arches.

means.word_mean: 1. a game in which players hit a wooden ball through a series of hoops; the winner is the first to traverse all the hoops and hit a peg
1. drive away by hitting with one's ball, "croquet the opponent's ball"
2. play a game in which players hit a wooden ball through a series of hoops
